comment: /**  * Reads a snapshot from the given input view.  *  * @param inputView the input to read from.  * @param userCodeClassLoader user classloader to deserialize the objects in the snapshot.  * @return the deserialized snapshot.  * @throws IOException on deserialization problems.  */
code: /**  * Reads a snapshot from the given input view.  *  * @param inputView the input to read from.  * @param userCodeClassLoader user classloader to deserialize the objects in the snapshot.  * @return the deserialized snapshot.  * @throws IOException on deserialization problems.  */ @Nonnull StateMetaInfoSnapshot readStateMetaInfoSnapshot(@Nonnull DataInputView inputView, @Nonnull ClassLoader userCodeClassLoader) throws IOException.
